revised_title: On the Lateral and Mesial Striae of the Cerebral Cortex
tldr: The author examines the mesial and lateral striae of the cerebral cortex, investigating their relationship to the fasciola cinerea and circumcallosal convolution. They also discuss the challenges of tracing atrophied fascia dentata and circumcallosal convolutions through the indusium griseum, and their potential homology. Additionally, the article mentions a study on cultivating parasitic protozoa from malignant tumors and other tissues, as well as infection experiments and cancer treatment.
